name: cliget
title: cliget
description: Download protected files using curl, wget, or aria2
author: Zaid Abdulla (http://zaidabdulla.com)

preferences.name: use_double_quotes
preferences.title: Escape with double-quotes
preferences.description: Use double quotation marks (") for command-line arguments. Enable this if you plan to *execute* the commands on a Windows machine.

preferences.name: remove_accept_encoding
preferences.title: Remove Accept-Encoding header
preferences.description: Remove Accept-Encoding header from request headers to avoid compressed response from server.

preferences.name: curl.options
preferences.title: Extra cURL options
preferences.description: Add extra command-line arguments to be appended to the cURL command.

preferences.name: wget.options
preferences.title: Extra Wget options
preferences.description: Add extra command-line arguments to be appended to the Wget command.

preferences.name: aria2.options
preferences.title: Extra aria2 options
preferences.description: Add extra command-line arguments to be appended to the aria2c command.

preferences.name: youtube-dl.options
preferences.title: Extra youtube-dl options
preferences.description: Add extra command-line arguments to be appended to the youtube-dl command.
